idea:
There are lot of people moving into India, moving back to India or moving within India. For the current tech savvy generation it is very hard to find a locality to live in based on critieria that might be important to them.  For example, crime and safety in the area, housing affordability in the area, schools , hospitals ,jobs etc. Things which are essential living and finding reviews or information on them is missing. 

With the startup India initiative ifore people want to move to India, there should be a online place to find the key information they need to make a decision and not be crippled by the unknowns.
name: Zetch

name: STRATAHIVE SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Greentide Enviro Solutions Pvt Ltd has invented a wood chipper machine which can convert tree trimmings into soil amendments. The biggest problem of all municipalities in India is disposal of  tree trimmings in the monsoons. If the trees are not trimmed it may fall, leading to casualty ( In the monsoon of 2018, between June and September, as many as 1,007 tree/branch collapse incidents were reported and six people had died in Mumbai alone - as per DNA report ).

This machine reduces the volume by 80%. Hence reducing the diesel consumption by 80 %. And also reducing the carbon footprint created by the CO2 emissions of these trucks. The output from these machines can be dried and used as carbon additives along with the organic wastes generated in households to create compost in our composter machines. Our wood chipper machine is the only machine in the world which can chip palm fronds. We intend to patent this design with your help. Our machines are trailer mounted hence can be hitched to the site of tree fall or tree trimming.
name: GREENTIDE ENVIRO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
